-- | helpers for deploying to Heroku

@package heroku
@version 0.1.2.3

module Web.Heroku.RabbitMQ
data AmqpSettings
AmqpSettings :: !String -> !Text -> !Text -> !Text -> !Int -> AmqpSettings
amqpHostName :: AmqpSettings -> !String
amqpVirtualHost :: AmqpSettings -> !Text
amqpUser :: AmqpSettings -> !Text
amqpPass :: AmqpSettings -> !Text
amqpPort :: AmqpSettings -> !Int
amqpConnSettings :: IO AmqpSettings
parseAmqpUrl :: String -> AmqpSettings
instance Show AmqpSettings
instance Eq AmqpSettings

module Web.Heroku.MongoDB
mongoLabConnParams :: IO [(Text, Text)]
mongoHQConnParams :: IO [(Text, Text)]
parseDatabaseUrl :: String -> [(Text, Text)]

module Web.Heroku.Postgres
dbConnParams :: IO [(Text, Text)]
parseDatabaseUrl :: String -> [(Text, Text)]

module Web.Heroku
dbConnParams :: IO [(Text, Text)]
parseDatabaseUrl :: String -> [(Text, Text)]
